question:
Which of the following are modes of adaptations in the Desert vegetation?
  1. Presence of no or short leaves
  2. No presence of chlorophyll at all
  3. Well- developed root system

Select the correct answer from the codes given below-
explanation: Desert vegetation grows in temperature having high variability, low rainfall, arid or semi-arid conditions. Thus to survive the plants adopt various modes of adaptations like short or no leaves, no or little presence of chlorophyll and well developed root system (to draw and store water).
